headquarters.name: Headquarters
headquarters.desc: The headquarters coordinate the development and construction speed of your empire. The higher the level of the office, the quicker the other buildings will develop.
headquarters.feature: REDUCE THE UPGRADE TIME FOR BUILDINGS

training_facility.name: Training Facility
training_facility.desc: Here you can build units to attack your opponents. The time in which each unit will be completed will depend on the type of the unit and the level of the facility.
training_facility.feature: REDUCE THE RECRUITEMENT TIME FOR UNITS

operation_center.name: Operation Center
operation_center.desc: This building increases the efficiency of your empire and permits you to get a bonus on all of your income.
operation_center.feature: +0.005% INCOME PER LEVEL (Does not work on the daily prize)

pantheon.name: Pantheon
pantheon.desc: The Pantheon does not have any particular function, but it shows a sign of wealth striking jealousy in your opponents.

research_center.name: Research Center
research_center.desc: The Research Center allows the training of your units in new techniques, giving them more expertise in combat. As with the HQ, higher is the level, faster the skills are developed.
research_center.feature: DECREASE THE TIME REQUIRED TO LEARN NEW TRAINING TECHNIQUES

crackhouse.name: Crack House
crackhouse.desc: A crack house is where your drug dealers produce DRUGS... slowly but surely

hydrofarm.name: Hydroponic Farm
hydrofarm.desc: A good solution for producing more DRUGS without soil is to use the Hydroculture.

meth_lab.name: Meth Lab
meth_lab.desc: This building contains drug experts which produce DRUGS with a comfortable speed.

cocina.name: Cocina
cocina.desc: We call it 'LaCocina' or 'LaCuisine', it produces more DRUGS with a better speed.

pharma_lab.name: Pharmaceutical Lab
pharma_lab.desc: Here is where you go if you want to produce DRUGS massively to take over the DrugWars.

drug_storage.name: Drug Storage
drug_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more DRUGS and keep them safe from enemies.

ammunition.name: Ammunition Factory
ammunition.desc: This is your first building to produce WEAPONS.

weapon_factory.name: Weapon Factory
weapon_factory.desc: Want to produce more WEAPONS? The solution may be the weapon factory

smuggle.name: Smuggle
smuggle.desc: Smuggling can be worth it and it produces more WEAPONS.

blackmarket.name: Black Market
blackmarket.desc: The black market is the good place to trade weapons, it produces WEAPONS.

metalprint.name: 3D Metal printing
metalprint.desc: This is the ultimate way to produce WEAPONS fast.

weapon_storage.name: Weapon Storage
weapon_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more WEAPONS and keep them safe from enemies.

t_distillery.name: Traditional Distillery
t_distillery.desc: This is your first building to produce ALCOHOLS.

bar.name: Bar
bar.desc: Want to produce more ALCOHOLS? The solution may be the bar

brewery.name: Brewery
brewery.desc: Smuggling can be worth it and it produces more ALCOHOLS.

castle.name: Castle
castle.desc: The Castle produces ALCOHOLS by transforming grapes into wine.

industrial_distillery.name: Industrial Distillery
industrial_distillery.desc: This is the ultimate way to produce faster ALCOHOLS .

alcohol_storage.name: Alcohol Silo
alcohol_storage.desc: This building helps you to stock more ALCOHOLS and keep them safe from enemies.

camera.name: Cameras
camera.desc: The more cameras you have means you can spy on your neighboors more and catch any suspects move.

defense_troop.name: Defense Troops
defense_troop.desc: A good defense which consist of having strong defenders.

defense_system.name: Security System
defense_system.desc: This is a sophisticated system to defend yourself

hidden_mines.name: Hidden Mines
hidden_mines.desc: Put some mines around your base and suprise your opponents!
